channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Arcadia’s Massive SDF-1 Macross Toy Is Now Better Than Ever
item.description: One of the most iconic designs in all of mecha anime now has a huge toy to do it justice. In short, the SDF-1 Macross has never looked so good.

item.title: Classic Mecha Game ‘Virtual On’ Celebrates Its 30th Anniversary
item.description: Today marks the 30th anniversary of the original 'Cyber Troopers Virtual On', which was to be released in Japanese arcades and later worldwide.

item.title: PFL Lyon Full Card Preview – Date, Time And How To Watch
item.description: PFL Lyon Dec 13 features Nemkov vs Ferreira for heavyweight title and Cyborg vs Collins. Watch at 11am ET on ESPN Unlimited.

item.title: ‘NYT Mini Crossword’ Clues And Answers For Thursday, November 27
item.description: Looking for help with today's NYT Mini Crossword puzzle? Here are some hints and answers for the puzzle.

item.title: The Complexity of Civet Coffee Goes Well Beyond Your Palate
item.description: The increased demand for civet coffee has fueled civet poaching and smuggling. If we can recreate similar fermentation in a bioreactor then we can end...

item.title: ‘Stranger Things’ has made at least $1B for Netflix already. Could it make $2B?
Recent college grads are losing their edge in the job market, study shows
item.description: The unemployment gap between college and high school graduates has reached its lowest level in decades, according to a new report from the Cleveland F...

item.title: Campbell’s fires exec after leaked recording berating ‘poor’ customers and ‘bioengineered meat’ prompts outrage and investigation
item.description: The comments were caught on a recording by a now-former employee.

item.title: Tariffs have surprising effect on unemployment and inflation patterns, Fed analysis reveals
item.description: The San Francisco Federal Reserve warns that current tariffs are "unprecedented in magnitude" compared to 40 years of trade data, making economic pred...

item.title: ‘Low-hire, low-fire’ economy grinds on as lower-than-expected jobless claims suggests layoffs aren’t spiking
item.description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits in the week ending Nov. 22 dropped 6,000 from the previous week to 216,000, the Labor Department reported.

item.title: Why an ASEAN power grid is key to tapping Southeast Asia’s green potential
item.description: A regional grid may be pricy, but it can help export green power where it needs to go—and boost regional cooperation too.

item.title: Supreme Court to hear Texas landlord’s lawsuit against the Post Office for failing to deliver mail for 2 years
item.description: The DOJ argued that if the landlord wins, people will infer mail didn’t arrive “because of a rude comment that they heard, or what have you.”

item.title: Americans can’t agree on what ‘middle class’ means anymore, and they’re debating it in the comments of TikTok home tours
item.description: The “average” or “normal” home tour is fascinating, even dividing, thousands of Americans on TikTok who can’t agree on social class.

item.title: Stocks close higher for 4th straight day, eye best Thanksgiving week since 2012
Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq on pace for 4th straight day of gains in final hour — live
U.S. economy muddled along during government shutdown, Fed's 'beige book' finds
Stocks' strong comeback ahead of Thanksgiving hasn't yet erased November's slide
Consumer confidence falls sharply as Americans worry about the economy
item.description: Consumer confidence plunged in November to lowest level since April as Americans cite inflation, tariffs, and uncertainty as weighing on sentiment, ac...

item.title: Nearly 1 in 4 American households living paycheck to paycheck, report reveals
item.description: A new Bank of America Institute report shows 24% of U.S. households live paycheck to paycheck in 2025, up from last year as inflation continues to out...

item.title: Builders cut prices and offer new home incentives as affordability gap shrinks
item.description: The housing affordability gap narrows as new home prices become competitive with existing properties, especially in South and West where inventory inc...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
